replies.body:
Damn, who knew there were so many talented pixel artists in OCE? I'm especially digging Echildagnir's amazing landscape, Chikorita's colours, and Spud Inxanity and DoodleHenge's entries. They clearly know what they're doing with those clean shapes + lines and efficient shading. 

http://i.imgur.com/3Ubn60s.png[/img] http://i.imgur.com/vsGxZZJ.gif[/img] http://i.imgur.com/FvRzUBW.png[/img] http://i.imgur.com/TB5Qv5D.png[/img]

If I'd known we could submit gifs I would have tried animating mine a bit haha. Nice job everyone, this was really fun, hope there's something similar next year :D
ahh, thank you ! it makes me happy to hear that people like my entry, thank you again <3
I've never done Pixel Art before, unreal I was selected, thanks Rito! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
(Also my submission was a .gif)
nice animation! yeah I was really surprised by the amount of animated gifs it was awesome!

Congrats to all the winners! There's so many awesome pictures this year :D
I think this competition's even more popular than last year- I hope we keep seeing cool community contests like this!
I love the gif of Nasus farming wards (   :
Thank you for another honourable mention, hopefully next year my work will be higher quality worthy of being a official winner!

O_o

I never knew how much I needed this in my life...

https://i.gyazo.com/07d40121d0db855be56244ce6aa54f3f.gif

Amazing!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
;; I'm so happy you like it <3
I got Honorable Mentions. First time pixel art OMG {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Ayyye lmao I won? xD Out of all the comps I've entered who would've thought it'd be the pixel art one that I'd have a win in haha. Gratz to all the winners anyways Chikorita's one is probably my fav.
I'm glad you like my entry, awesome work on yours!
I'm currently making a game atm for my course that involves floating islands, those small floating rocks are a nice touch totally gonna use that haha >:D

ahah , no worries xD
would love to see your game when its done!
Yours is unquestionably one of my favourites, next to LyokoBlight's submission. They're awesome!
L I T.                     {{summoner:14}}

I feel insulted that my entry isn't in the full gallery of the entries. Was mine disqualified or something :(

Hey! 

It wasn't disqualified. Looks like there was an error during uploading. It should be up there now.

ahhh i'm so happy mine was chosen!! i was so nervous - it was my first time doing pixel art, let alone an animated one :P  

there are so many amazing entries!! chikorita's one is definitely one of my favourites

I'm glad you like my entry! 
hopefully next time I get a spot with the official winners ^_^
Congratulations to the winners! The pixel art looks amazing and hope to see more of these entries for next year :)

I'm actually really surprise that i made in the Honorable Mentions list, it was the first time in something like a year that i sat down and done pixel art let alone something i'm somewhat happy with. Makes me a little bit happy, congrats to everyone. You've all done an amazing job.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Awesome work everyone. 

Also there was a Pixelart contest????? How could I miss such a thing T_T

I think KawaiiHannah and Narureaper are my two favourite pieces.

OMG I actually won something! {{item:3683}} 

I can't help thinking that everyone else's are more talented than mine... amazing work!
:D
PIXELS!!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Great art work guys! congratz on the winners, little bit sad on the inside that I didn't make it in but ill get over it :/
Hope this happens again next year ill be trying again, was fun making an entry anyway, thanks Marauder for 
organising this :D.

I managed to do something that resulted in mine being wiped to the background just the night before, couldn't undo. Was so mad, but every one of these entries are SO much better than mine, so no harm really. Well drawn guys~
These are all incredible.
thank you so much!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

I'm just in AWE! As an Ahri main, my personal fave is Flight's <3
OMFG I WON SOMETHING FOR ONCE
